CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1959, pg. B2, reads: "State NAACP Convenes in 3-Day Meet Here - 'Mr. NAACP' - Atty. Thurgood Marshall during Sunday address, at mass meeting held in Wesley Center AME Zion Church..."
TitMainTitle: Atty. Thurgood Marshall speaking from podium in Wesley Center AME Zion church with men and women seated behind him, including Bishop Charles Foggie on left and Daisy Lampkin on right, for NAACP convention
CatSubject_tab: Marshall, Thurgood, 1908-1993.Foggie, Charles H.
